description.en: Döbeln salutes from horseback before cheering Swedish infantry in the afternoon light near Jutas.

narration.en: Rallying himself, Döbeln greets his men, inspiring confidence as officers prepare the defensive positions ahead.

en.text: Steady now—Jutas will be our stand.

info: Scene follows storyboard: bottom-wide panel, SplitWide layout. Döbeln centered in ActionSquare.
